anime.description: Continuation of the gag comedy about Oshiri Kajiri Mushi XVIII, a 10-year-old insect who goes to Biting School to inherit his family`s Biting Shop business. Source: ANN

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

episode.title: 救え!? ぼくらの銭湯
Save Our Bath House?!
Sauvons nos bains publics !
Sukue!? Bokura no Sentou
episode.summary: B.B.B.`s Papa and Grandpa take him for his first visit to a bath house. He loves it, but is saddened to hear the owner say he`ll have to shut down due to a lack of customers. When the three Bottom Biting Bugs see all the people who would be inconvenienced if the bath house shut down, they decide to act... but they only have one week! Can they attract more customers and save the bath house?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: やまびこ, ヤッホー!?
Mountain Echo, Yoo-hoo?!
Yamabiko, Yahhoo!?
episode.summary: B.B.B`s class is climbing a mountain together. When they finally reach the peak, they take turns shouting "Yoo-hoo!" But the voices echoing back seem off somehow. Mr. Gab doesn`t want his students to go home disappointed, so he and B.B.B. ride off on Laliho to give the lazy mountain echoes a talking-to! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エコだ!? プー1号
That`s Ecological?! Poot No. 1
Eco da!? Poot Ichigou
episode.summary: Grandpa has built a robot called "Poot No. 1" and gathered people from all around for its big reveal. He declares that the robot runs on a substance that is going to waste all over the world. What could this ecological fuel be?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決定!? アイドルオーディション
It`s Decided?! The Idol Audition
Kettei!? Idol Audition
episode.summary: Capline enters the Town Idol Audition. Her rival is Sakura-san, the cute girl with a lovely singing voice. Capline gives it all she`s got in a battle she can`t lose. After the self-introductions and singing contest, Capline is disheartened by the perfection of Sakura`s performance. B.B.B. can`t stand to see her so down, so he takes action! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おみこし, ワッショイ!?
Portable Shrine, Wasshoi?!
Omikoshi, Wasshoi!?
episode.summary: It`s the day of the Biting Festival, and the main event is a contest to choose the most exciting portable shrine. B.B.B.`s dad leads the team carrying his shrine, declaring that his will be the most popular this year. The crowd loves his shrine, but then Gabriel`s dad rides in on a magnificent gilded shrine that draws everyone`s attention! Which shrine will win the contest?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走れ!? ファットン
Run, Fatton?!
Hashire!? Fatton
episode.summary: The relay race is the highlight of the sports meet. Fatton has been selected as the anchor for the White Team... and the Red Team`s anchor is Gabriel. Gabriel is excited to show his stuff with the new shoes his dad bought him, but the slow-running Fatton`s mood is at an all-time low. When he asks his mother for advice, she decides to help him prepare for the meet with a rigorous training program! Will Fatton be ready for the big race?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どこだ!? 黄金のおしり
Where Is It?! The Golden Butt
Doko da!? Ougon no Oshiri
episode.summary: B.B.B. and his friends are playing in their secret base as usual when they find an old map with "Tubb Nedlog" written on it. They read it backwards and realize it says... "Golden Butt"! Is this a map leading to the legendary golden butt said to bring happiness to anyone who bites it?! The gang immediately sets out to find the golden butt - can they really find it?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どうなる!? 夫婦ゲンカ
What`s Gonna Happen?! Husband and Wife Fight
Dou Naru!? Fuufugenka
episode.summary: B.B.B.`s Mama and Papa always get along well, but today, a fight has broken out between them over the TV remote! Grandpa says it`s best not to interfere, but this time, neither Mama nor Papa is giving an inch. B.B.B. decides to step in and help them make up. How can he stop this quarrel? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ムフゥ!? ガブハチ先生の恋
Mmph?! Mr. Gab`s Romance
Mhmm!? Gabuhachi-sensei no Koi
episode.summary: Mr. Gab, the teacher who usually yells "You fool!" all the time, is spacing out and acting strangely. B.B.B. and his friends follow him to find out what`s going on! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ライバル!? 偽かじりや
Rival?! The Fake Bitery
Rival!? Nisekajiriya
episode.summary: A Shady new shop in town, "Bitery Z," claims that they can make customers "10 billion times happier than that other bitery"! What kind of shop could it be? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 寿司, くいねえ!?
Have Some Sushi?!
Sushi, Kui nee!?
episode.summary: B.B.B. and his family visit a revolving sushi shop, where they`re greeted by a familiar voice: "Hey! Yo! We`re just chillin` with vinegar and mirin!" It turns out the once-funky DJ, KJR, is now an aspiring sushi master! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドキドキ!? お楽しみ会
Heart-Pounding?! Fun Day
Dokidoki!? Otanoshimi Kai
episode.summary: Tomorrow is Fun Day, when all the students present something fun for the class. Everyone is excited to show off the results of their practicing, but B.B.B. has totally forgotten about Fun Day! He hurries home to ask Grandpa for help, and Grandpa gives him an idea for a great presentation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ピカピカ!? かじり大掃除
Sparkling Clean?! The Biters` Big Clean-Up
Pikapika!? Kajiri Oosouji
episode.summary: Today is the school`s annual Super Special Big Clean-up day, when the students clean up not just the classroom, but the whole school - and Mr. Gab isn`t letting anyone go home until the school is sparkling clean! Of course, B.B.B. and his friends can`t quite take the task seriously, and try to come up with ways to get their cleaning done easily. From the hallway to the classroom to the huge gym, a few well-placed bites make for a crazy clean-up day... eventually dragging even Mr. Gab into the chaos! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 取り戻せ!? ババの笑顔
Get It Back?! Grandma`s Smile
Torimodose!? Baba no Egao
episode.summary: Usually, Grandma is always smiling, but something is different today. She looks sad and keeps sighing... She doesn`t even crack a smile at B.B.B.`s best gag. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目指せ!? かじりキング
Aim for It?! The Biter King
Mezase!? Kajiri King
episode.summary: It`s time for the Biter King Championship! Proud biters from around the world attempt various challenging courses, and whoever reaches the top of the Ultimate Biter Tower at the end in the shortest time wins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 当てろ!? 福引き大作戦
Win Big?! The Lottery Plan
Atero!? Fukubiki Daisakusen
episode.summary: B.B.B. always looks forward to the shopping district`s year-end lottery. The first prize is his favorite treat, castella - and a whole year`s worth! He`s gotta win that! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 負けるな!? 町のゴミ拾い
Don`t Lose?! Neighborhood Trash Pick-Up
Makeruna!? Machi no Gomi Hiroi
episode.summary: Today is the monthly neighborhood trash pick-up day. As everyone in the neighborhood gathers to help pick up all the litter in town, Gabriel and his mother arrive on the scene. Gabriel`s mother taunts B.B.B., saying "Gabriel-chan`s superior talent will shine when picking up trash, too!" The contest is on to see who can pick up the most trash: B.B.B. or Gabriel... and Gabriel overwhelms B.B.B. with a huge vehicle that sucks up litter! How will this contest end?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 限界!? かじり禁止令
Limit Reached?! The Biting Ban
Genkai!? Kajiri Kinshi Rei
episode.summary: When B.B.B. bites a bottom just for a prank, his father bans him from biting. Being told that be can`t bite just makes B.B.B. want to bite even more! When everything around him starts to look like a tasty behind, he can`t take it anymore! Can he keep the promise he made to his father, or will he give in to temptation and bite a bottom? B.B.B.`s "bitelust" has reached its limit! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: わらしべ!? たーすけ
The Straw Tasuke?!
Warashibe!? Taasuke
episode.summary: Today is Sakura`s birthday, and Tasuke decides to give her a four-leaf clover as a present. Just when he finally finds one, B.B.B. says nothing good has happened to him lately, and asks him to trade it for a pink colored pencil. Just like the legend of the Straw Millionaire, Tasuke`s birthday present for Sakura continues to change to something else, until at last... Will Sakura like the unbelievable present he ends up giving her?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 現れた!? ハハの恋人
Look Who Showed Up?! Mom`s Boyfriend
Arawareta!? Haha no Koibito
episode.summary: Mom is in an unusually good mood, and is dressing herself up. It seems she`s preparing to go meet with her "first love"! Dad says it doesn`t bother him at all, but he can`t help feeling restless... So he and B.B.B. secretly follow Mom to the meeting place. The man who arrives on the scene is a real dandy who seems like he could steal Mom away any time! Dad can`t just stand around... What will he do?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 来るぞ!?家庭訪問
He`s Coming?! A Home Visit
episode.summary: Today is the day when Mr. Gab pays a visit to his students` homes. His first stop is Gabriel`s house, followed by B.B.B.`s. Mom is bizarrely fired up for the visit, declaring she won`t lose to Gabriel`s home. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 探れ!?ラリホーの悩み
Figure It Out?! Laliho`s Problem
episode.summary: Laliho is always cheerful, but today, he`s sighing and not acting like himself. Is he hungry? Is he in love? They ask him over and over, but can`t understand his answers of "Laliho." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突!?ドッジリボール
The Clash?! Dodgebiteball
episode.summary: Dodgebiteball is a game in which the target imagines a thrown ball to be a bottom, and catches it in his mouth. Gabriel has been practicing his strong fast ball just for this day. It`s a one-on-one showdown between B.B.B. and Gabriel! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宿題!?一日一善
Homework?! A Good Deed Each Day
Shukudai!? Ichinichiichizen
episode.summary: Today`s homework is "a good deed each day." All the students have to do one nice thing and share it with the class the next day. Everyone is at a loss as to what they should do, but Gabriel is brimming with confidence. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かわいすぎる!?ぼくのペット
Too Cute?! My Pet
episode.summary: On the way home, B.B.B. and his friends find a little dog. They all fall in love instantly with its sad whimper, watery eyes, and wagging tail. Unable to resist its cuteness, B.B.B. names the dog Coo-chan and asks his parents if he can keep it, but his father is opposed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モーリス, 危機一髪!?
Morris, A Close Call?!
episode.summary: The kids draw faces of their family members on hollow egg shells at school. B.B.B. is excited to show his mother the especially nice drawing he made of her face, but on the way home, he trips and drops the egg! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 正直者, バカを見る!?
Honesty Doesn`t Pay?!
episode.summary: hile cleaning up, B.B.B. swings a broom around when it flies free and knocks a tooth off of the statue by the school entrance! The statue was made in commemoration of 100 years since the school`s founding, and is very important to the principal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖, 学校の幽霊!?
Terror! The School Ghost?!
episode.summary: Fatton saw a ghost near the science classroom! In the darkness, it looked like a slit-mouthed ghost with a wide open mouth. When he tells everyone about it the next day, they don`t believe him, but Gabriel comes up with an idea. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お願い!?かじりGALS
Please! Biter Gals
episode.summary: B.B.B. receives a letter asking to meet him. He awaits the arrival of its sender with excitement, convinced that it was a love letter... but instead the four Biter Gals show up, steaming with rage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天才料理人!?かじり虫
The Genius Chef?! B.B.B.
episode.summary: Everyone in B.B.B.`s family except him has caught a cold! In hopes of helping them feel better, B.B.B. decides to make a nutritious stew for them, and his friends are eager to help. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ちょー生意気!?転校生
Super Stuck-Up?! Transfer Student
episode.summary: A new student named Bitelinda has transferred into the class. She`s beautiful and speaks fluent English, so the class is excited to meet her! B.B.B. and the others teach her about the school and the class in hopes of becoming friends, but Bitelinda has a very cold, self-centered personality. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大冒険!?工場見学
Big Adventure?! Factory Field Trip
episode.summary: Today, the whole class is going on a field trip to a state-of-the-art, high-tech candy factory. B.B.B. and his friends are thrilled by all the big machines and sweet scents... but the next thing they know, Capline and Pak are nowhere to be found! Source: crunchyroll
